scripts.deploy:auth: gcloud functions deploy authCallback --project=flair-freeagent --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --region=europe-west2 --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point authCallback --set-env-vars=GCP_PROJECT=flair-freeagent
scripts.deploy:freeagent: npm run predeploy:freeagent && gcloud functions deploy FreeAgent --project=flair-freeagent --runtime=nodejs20 --trigger-http --region=europe-west2 --allow-unauthenticated --source=. --entry-point=FreeAgent --gen2 --set-env-vars=GCP_PROJECT=flair-freeagent
